StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetNWAByID]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @NwaID int ) AS
SELECT [MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID] as PersonID ,NWA.[NWA_ID] ,[NWA_DECLARED_DATE] ,CASE WHEN CS.STATUS_TYPE = 'O' -- if this is an o.cer then use NWA_DATE_STARTED_WORKING THEN [NWA_DATE_STARTED_WORKING] ELSE ISNULL((SELECT MIN(e.[StartDate]) -- this is an enlisted so try to use the 1st Interview Date FROM [RSSOSS].[USMC].[Event] e inner join [RSSOSS].[USMC].EventSubject es on es.EventId = e.ID inner join [RSSOSS].[USMC].EventType et on et.ID = e.EventTypeId and (et.ID = 1 or et.ID = 85) -- Appointments inner join [RSSOSS].[USMC].eventoutcome eo on eo.EventId = e.ID inner join [RSSOSS].[USMC].InterviewOutcome intout on intout.ID = eo.InterviewOutcomeId and (intout.ID = 1 or intout.ID = 2) -- New Working Applicant or Follow Up WHERE es.SubjectId = pro.ProspectId), [NWA_DATE_STARTED_WORKING]) END as [NWA_DATE_STARTED_WORKING] ,[PARENTAL_CONSENT] ,[PROJECTED_SHIP_MONTH] ,[NWA_LOG_NOTES] ,[PROJECTED_PROG_CHOICE1] ,[PROJECTED_PROG_CHOICE2] ,[PROJECTED_PROG_CHOICE3] ,[ACTIVITY_CODE] ,[SOURCE_CODE] ,[SOURCE_CODE_DUAL] ,NWA.[SourceDualDesc] ,[RECRUITER_OF_RECORD_ID] ,[ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID] ,[WORKING_RECRUITER_ID] ,[CATEGORY_CODE] ,[EDUCATION_LEVEL] ,[EDUCATION_CODE] ,NWA.[PPC] ,[BACH_GRAD_YEAR] ,NWA.[USER_LOGIN] ,NWA.[UPDATE_DATE] ,NWA.[rowguid] ,[OFFICER_COMPONENT_CODE] ,[SHIP_MISSION] ,NWA.[EMAIL_ADDRESS] ,[RAPP_ISSUE_DATE] ,[RAPP_SUBMIT_DATE] ,[BACH_GRAD_MONTH] ,[NATIONAL_CALL_TO_SERVICE] ,[OCCR] ,COALESCE(RTRIM(RP.RANK_CODE), SPACE(0)) + SPACE(1) + COALESCE(RTRIM(RCRTR.LAST_NAME), SPACE(0)) + SPACE(1) + COALESCE(RTRIM(RCRTR.FIRST_NAME), SPACE(0)) + SPACE(1) + COALESCE(RTRIM(RCRTR.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME), SPACE(0)) AS RECRUITER_OF_RECORD_NAME ,[OFC_NWA_LOG_NOTE] ,NWA.[rowguid] ,NWA.[Evalua.on] ,NWA.[1stDutySta.on] ,NWA.[ProvenPerformer] ,NWA.[Mission_Year_Work_For] ,NWA.[ReferralSSN] ,NWA.DUTY_PREFERENCE1 ,NWA.DUTY_PREFERENCE2 ,NWA.DUTY_PREFERENCE3 ,[Miscellaneous1] ,[Miscellaneous2] ,[Miscellaneous3] FROM [dbo].[NWA] WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN [dbo].[CANDIDATE_STATUS] CS ON CS.NWA_ID = NWA.NWA_ID LEFT JOIN [dbo].[RECRUITING_PERSON] RP ON RP.RECRUITING_PERSON_ID = NWA.RECRUITER_OF_RECORD_ID LEFT JOIN [dbo].[PERSON] RCRTR ON RP.RECRUITING_PERSON_ID = RCRTR.PERSON_ID LEFT JOIN [Prospec.ng].[USMC].[Prospect] pro ON pro.NwaId = NWA.rowguid WHERE CS.CANDIDATE_STATUS_ID = (SELECT MAX(CANDIDATE_STATUS_ID) FROM CANDIDATE_STATUS WHERE NWA_ID = NWA.NWA_ID) AND NWA.NWA_ID = @NwaID
